signup.content: Signing up for the raid: {{description}}. Please select a build.
signup.success: You have successfully selected your build for the raid!

statusDetails.openDescription: Click the button below to join!
statusDetails.fullDescription: All slots are taken, but you can still join the waitlist!
statusDetails.closedDescription: Raid is full or closed for new participants

errors.raidNotOpen: Raid is not open for signups
errors.userNotSigned: User is not signed up for the raid
errors.slotTaken: Slot already taken, please select another one
errors.signupFailed: Failed to sign up for the raid. Please try again later.
errors.signoutFailed: Failed to leave raid. Please try again later.
errors.selectRoleFailed: Failed to select build. Please try again later.
errors.selectBuildGeneric: Failed to select build. Please try again later.
errors.signoutGeneric: Failed to leave raid. Please try again later.

success.signupSuccess: You have signed up for the raid! Good luck!
success.signoutSuccess: You have left the raid. We hope to see you next time!

signout.success: You have left the raid. We hope to see you next time!

errors.guildOnly: ❌ This command can only be used in a Discord server.
errors.adminRequired: ❌ You need Administrator permissions to manage raids.
errors.generic: ❌ An error occurred while processing the command.

delete.failed: ❌ Failed to delete raid. Please try again later.
delete.notFound: ❌ Raid `{{raidId}}` not found. Please check the raid ID and try again.
delete.notAuthorized: ❌ You don't have permission to delete this raid.
